memberdef.name: REORDER
memberdef.initializer: WITH_CHRONO("doubles:reorder", \ for (size_t k = 0; k < No; k++) \ for (size_t j = 0; j < No; j++) \ for (size_t i = 0; i < No; i++) { \ Tijk[_IJK_(i, j, k)] += _t_buffer[_IJK_(__II, __JJ, __KK)]; \ } \ )

memberdef.name: DGEMM_PARTICLES
memberdef.initializer: atrip::xgemm<F>( "T" \ , "N" \ , (int const*)&NoNo \ , (int const*)&No \ , (int const*)&Nv \ , &one \ , __A \ , (int const*)&Nv \ , __B \ , (int const*)&Nv \ , &zero \ , _t_buffer.data() \ , (int const*)&NoNo \ );

memberdef.name: DGEMM_HOLES
memberdef.initializer: atrip::xgemm<F>( "N" \ , __TRANSB \ , (int const*)&NoNo \ , (int const*)&No \ , (int const*)&No \ , &m_one \ , __A \ , (int const*)&NoNo \ , __B \ , (int const*)&No \ , &zero \ , _t_buffer.data() \ , (int const*)&NoNo \ );
